title: pUraNanE unniDam
sahitya:
pUraNanE unniDam ip-pUnkuzhalai IndEn pari-


anupallavi

  nAraNanE ennuyirin nAyakanE ivvulagin kAraNanE kani madhura gAna rasam pozhivAi


caraNam    uyirAna Odaiyil un OmkAram olikka uLLArvam un peyarai OyAdArkalikka
ayarAmal un aruLAl angamellAm silirkka ashaiyAmal un karattil anbuDanE irukka
Ananda bhakti malar anudinamum pUttunakkE aLLi aLLi arucitten uLLamellAm kuLira
